> 30 Earned leaves can be carry forwarded to the next financial year and more than 30 leaves will be expired with no encashment. 
> Got this offer as a fresher, no nagotiation. 
> 1 year of Probation period with 30 days notice period and after that 90 days notice period. 
> If leaving the company before the completion of one year then we have to return back the joining bonus of 25,000.
